bug.author: onchiptech
bug.summary: TypeError: a bytes-like object is required, not 'str'
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>I am getting the following error when I run t2t-trainer with --cloud_tpu option</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>vm_info = list_vm_names_and_ips() File "/home/gmail/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensor2tensor/utils/cloud_tpu.py", line 252, in list_vm_n ames_and_ips lines = [l.split() for l in list_out.split("\n")[1:-1]] TypeError: a bytes-like object is required, not 'str'</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: I believe this has been fixed. Please try again with the latest version of tensor2tensor.
